name: Track your podcast's rankings over time with Taddy Podcast API to Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## Track your podcast's rankings daily on Apple Podcasts with Taddy Podcast API to Google Sheets

## Who's it for
Podcast creators, producers, and marketing teams who want to monitor their podcast's performance on podcast charts over time.

## How it works
Every day, this workflow checks the top 200 podcasts on Apple Podcasts charts, you can specify the genre, finds your podcast's position (if ranked), and logs it to a Google Sheet with a timestamp. Track your growth over time and get alerted when you break into new ranking tiers.

## Requirements
- Taddy API account (sign up at taddy.org)
- Google Sheets with tracking spreadsheet
- Self-hosted n8n instance (required for community nodes)

## How to set up
1. Install the Taddy community node from Settings > Community Nodes
2. Add your Taddy API credentials
3. Create a Google Sheet with columns: Date, Genre, Rank, Podcast Name, Total Episodes
4. Update the Set Fields node with your podcast UUID and genre
5. Adjust the schedule trigger (default: every day at 10am)
6. Run once to test

## How to customize
- Track multiple podcasts by adding loops
- Monitor multiple genres
- Add Slack alerts when rank improves or drops significantly
- Calculate day-over-day change with a formula node
- Export weekly or monthly reports

nodes.name: Get Daily Top 200 on Apple Podcasts

parameters.content:
Appends new row to your tracking sheet
Each day adds a new data point
Use Google Sheets charts to visualize trends
Consider adding conditional formatting for rank changes

Formats the data for Google Sheets:
- Current date/time
- Chart position (or "Not Ranked")
- Genre tracked
- Podcast name
Add calculated fields here if needed

main.node: Get Daily Top 200 on Apple Podcasts
